application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Detailed drawings annotated with materials and finished appearance of the typical elevation and section drawings of new slimline double glazed windows shown in context with the brick reveal and internal architrave and panelling, typical elevation and section drawings showing the retained sashes the replacement of the glazing pane the drawing must be annotated with methodology for the works, internal elevation and section drawing of the relocated historic sash window with vertical timber shutters in the rear ground floor of the closet wing, annotated with methodology for removal, if storage required, this must be on site, reflective ceiling plan with detailed sections of new ceilings, rose and cornice, detailed drawings, including sections of the new skirting boards and new joinery, elevation and sections of new chimney-pieces and elevation and sections of new 'pod' bath pursuant to Condition 5 (a) (b) (c) (d) (e) (f) and (g) of listed building dated 22nd August 2024  (RN:24/02031/LBC)
